attributes.action: that the government make sure that workplaces adhere to bullying policies in the workplace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have recently been a victim of workplace bullying i have been signed of sick for stress and evrything the company have done precious little and want the government to make sure that every company sticks to bullying in the workpace laws(they have make sure there implemented)you ppl reading this may or may not have been a victim if you have then you will understand how you can get vry worried and i have read that other ppl comtemplate suicide(bullying isnt just physical it can be all sorts)if you havnt been a victim imagine if you were its not a nice feeling is it.i really need all your help to make sure this government does something come on please help other people not have to go through what i have all i want is for ppl like me like you to bring this to the attention of polititions its not all workplaces i know but there will be a lot of ppl being bullied at work who need this sort of help thanks to all who back my petition
